testcase.name: Sort by functionality testing
testcase.system-out: Given user loads the data from "excel" located at "src\test\resources\Fixture\Promo_DB_Data.xlsx".passed Then user launches browser with url "#TestUrl"..............................passed And user enters the Promo code "#Promo Code" in Search box named " Promo / PST / TA Code ".passed And user clicks on the search button........................................passed And user verify Dropdown named "Sort by:"...................................passed And user select the Dropdown with value "Start date"........................passed And user select the Dropdown with value "End date"..........................passed And user select the Dropdown with value "Promo code: A to Z"................passed And user select the Dropdown with value "Promo code: Z to A"................passed
